CustomField.description: The time in minutes between end of previous duty and start of this duty. Used to determine if there has been a rest break violation in field Rest_Break_Violation.
CustomField.formula: IF(AND(NOT(ISBLANK( Previous_Duty_End__c )),NOT(ISBLANK( Duty_Start__c ))), ( Duty_Start__c - Previous_Duty_End__c)*24, NULL )
CustomField.label: Shift Break Duration
